# cheekPuff

**Type Property**

The coefficient describing outward movement of both cheeks.

## Declaration

```swift
static let cheekPuff: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
```

## Discussion

The figure below shows a face geometry (see [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSCNFaceGeometry]) in two states, demonstrating values of `0.0` and `1.0` for this coefficient. In both states, the values for all other [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceAnchor/BlendShapeLocation] coefficients are set to `0.0`.



## Eyebrows, Cheeks, and Nose

- **browDownLeft**: The coefficient describing downward movement of the outer portion of the left eyebrow.
- **browDownRight**: The coefficient describing downward movement of the outer portion of the right eyebrow.
- **browInnerUp**: The coefficient describing upward movement of the inner portion of both eyebrows.
- **browOuterUpLeft**: The coefficient describing upward movement of the outer portion of the left eyebrow.
- **browOuterUpRight**: The coefficient describing upward movement of the outer portion of the right eyebrow.
- **cheekSquintLeft**: The coefficient describing upward movement of the cheek around and below the left eye.
- **cheekSquintRight**: The coefficient describing upward movement of the cheek around and below the right eye.
- **noseSneerLeft**: The coefficient describing a raising of the left side of the nose around the nostril.
- **noseSneerRight**: The coefficient describing a raising of the right side of the nose around the nostril.
